overview: A stork carrying a baby makes his usual rounds — only to discover that nobody wants the trouble of raising another kid. Then the bird encounters the home of roommates Tom and Jerry. Busy inside solving a tough jigsaw puzzle, our boys soon find the baby on their doorstep. Tom takes him in, but when Jerry tickles the kid on the cheek... POW! he takes a left hook in the face! Tom laughs at the humor of the situation — until the baby gives him a bopping as well
title: Puzzled Pals
